ud2.10:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā anupiyāyaṁ viharati ambavane.
ud2.10:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:2.1_0: Assosuṁ kho sambahulā bhikkhū āyasmato bhaddiyassa kāḷīgodhāya puttassa araññagatassapi rukkhamūlagatassapi
ud2.10:2.4_0: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho, āvuso, āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati,
ud2.10:2.5_1: so tamanussaramāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:3.1_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
ud2.10:3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
ud2.10:3.2_1: bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:3.4_0: Nissaṁsayaṁ kho, bhante, āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati.
ud2.10:3.5_1: so tamanussaramāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
ud2.10:4.2_0: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena bhaddiyaṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehi:
ud2.10:5.1_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto tenupasaṅkami;
ud2.10:5.3_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud2.10:5.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ bhaddiyaṁ kāḷīgodhāya puttaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
ud2.10:6.1_1: araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:7.1_1: atthavasaṁ sampassamāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:7.3_1: agāriyabhūtassa rajjaṁ kārentassa antopi antepure rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi,
ud2.10:7.4_0: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, evaṁ rakkhito gopito santo bhīto ubbiggo ussaṅkī utrāsī vihāsiṁ.
ud2.10:7.5_1: araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi eko abhīto anubbiggo anussaṅkī anutrāsī appossukko pannalomo paradattavutto,
ud2.10:7.6_1: atthavasaṁ sampassamāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesiṁ:
ud2.10:8.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
